sentences.sentence: Food industry: Filtrations of beer, drink, mineral w.
sentences.translation: 食品工业：啤酒、饮料、矿泉水等过滤。

sentences.sentence: Each time refuels when and trades the oil, must use 80 item of above oil screen filtrations, when the replacement must clean the fuel tank.
sentences.translation: 每次加油及换油时，必须用80目以上滤油网过滤，更换时需洗净油箱。

sentences.sentence: The easiest way to separate a liquid from a solid? Filtration! Learn how to effectively carry out gravity and vacuum filtrations in this video.
sentences.translation: 将液体从固体中分开来的最简易方法是什麽?过滤！在此影片中将学习如何有效的用重力过露及真空过滤来进行。
